edited_stories.edited_story_text: There was a huge snow storm last night. The snow covered everything, including the cars, so we couldn't go anywhere anytime soon. We took pictures of all the snow covering everything, it was a sight to behold.

edited_stories.edited_story_text: It snowed a lot. Everyone used spray paint to write graffiti and draw pictures in the snow. Some people wrote warnings. Other people spray painted on snow that had fallen on cars. Soon the snow was covered in graffiti.

edited_stories.edited_story_text: The snow was covered in graffiti. So others sprayed more paint covering more snow. Some even put warnings about the snow. The snow was covered in graffiti in the oddest places. In some places the graffiti competed in the snow .
